New_Rochelle.WCBS (AM): WCBS (880 AM, "WCBS Newsradio 880") is a radio station located in New York City. Owned by Entercom, the station broadcasts on a clear channel and is the flagship station of CBS Radio News. The station's studios are located in the combined Entercom facility in the Hudson Square area of Manhattan, and its transmitter tower is located on High Island in the Bronx, New York.
